Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA Centaur® Follicle Stimulating Hormone (FSH) Master Curve Material
ADVIA Centaur® FT4 Master Curve Material
ADVIA Centaur® T4 Master Curve Material
ADVIA Centaur® T3 Master Curve Material
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Quality control material for calibration verification
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVIA Centaur master curve materials (FSH, FT4, T4, T3) intended as quality control/calibration verification materials for respective hormone assays on ADVIA Centaur systems
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use in the verification of calibration and reportable range of the ADVIA Centaur FSH, FT4, T4, and T3 assays; for prescription use only
